overview:
About EPC World EPC World is top most construction and infrastructure business magazine having separate edition in India. It is 15 years old business magazine and very much popular among Engineers, businessmen, builders, contractors and top & middle level business professionals.EPC world provides up to dates, most authentic and in-depth news. It interacts with top and middle level management through discussion, interviews and debates etc.It reaches updates in construction and infrastructure industry in both India as well as abroad.

EPC World publishes daily as well as monthly reports on follows sectors –

• Construction And Infrastructure • Airports And Aviation • Cement Industry • Construction Equipments • Information Technology • Logistic And Transport • Oil And Gas • Port And Shipping • Power And Energy • Railways • Real Estate • Road And Bridges • Steel • Telecom

Contact Details: 303, 3rd Floor, Hilton Centre, Sector - 11, CBD Belapur, Navi Mumbai - 400614 Tel : 91 22 41610808 Fax : 91 22 27577770 Email : marketing@epcworld.in Website : www.epcworld.in

About epcworld.in

Epcworld.in is construction and infrastructure news portal. It is open source for getting information in different areas such as construction, infrastructure, telecom, real estate, oil and gas, power and energy and many more. There are thousands of unique visitors of epcworld.in per day. At epcworld.in you will find latest updated news in construction industry. For more details please log on to http://www.epcworld.in/
